mapper.select: SELECT A.ram, A.size, A.weight, A.brand, A.os, A.battery, A.istwoinone, A.hz, A.resolution, ROUND(B.price * (1 - B.dc_rate), -3) AS price, C.performance AS cpuPerformance, D.performance AS gpuPerformance, B.img AS detailImg, A.nm, A.product_code, C.nm AS cpuNm, D.nm AS gpuNm, B.price AS originalPrice, B.idetail, A.iproduct, A.img FROM t_product_master A INNER JOIN t_product_detail B ON A.iproduct = B.iproduct INNER JOIN t_product_cpu C ON A.icpu = C.icpu INNER JOIN t_product_gpu D ON A.igpu = D.igpu LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ROUND(AVG(rating), 1) AS rating, COUNT(iuser) AS ratingCount, iproduct FROM t_product_review GROUP BY iproduct ) E ON A.iproduct = E.iproduct WHERE B.isrep = 'Y' AND A.iproduct = #{iproduct}
SELECT color, idetail, img, iproduct FROM t_product_detail WHERE iproduct = #{iproduct} GROUP BY color ORDER BY isrep DESC
SELECT hdd, ssd, color, idetail FROM t_product_detail WHERE iproduct = #{iproduct} ORDER BY isrep DESC

SELECT A.rating, A.ctnt, A.rdt, B.nm AS userNm, A.iuser FROM t_product_review A INNER JOIN t_user B ON A.iuser = B.iuser WHERE A.iproduct = #{iproduct} ORDER BY A.rdt DESC LIMIT #{startIdx}, #{recordCount}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_product_review (iproduct, iuser, rating, ctnt) VALUES (#{iproduct}, #{iuser}, #{rating}, #{ctnt}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE rating = #{rating}, ctnt = #{ctnt}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(A.iorder) AS result FROM t_order A INNER JOIN t_order_product B ON A.iorder = B.iorder INNER JOIN t_product_detail C ON B.idetail = C.idetail INNER JOIN t_product_master D ON C.iproduct = D.iproduct WHERE A.iuser = #{iuser} AND D.iproduct = #{iproduct} AND A.order_status = '구매확정'
SELECT CEIL(COUNT(iquestion) / ${recordCount}) AS result FROM t_product_question WHERE iproduct = #{iproduct} AND parent = 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_product_question (iproduct, iuser, ctnt, parent) VALUES (#{iproduct}, #{iuser}, #{ctnt}, #{parent})
